entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
